main.title: Pavel Tretyakov — Frontend Developer | React, Next.js, TypeScript
main.description: Hi! I'm Pavel Tretyakov, a frontend developer with over 5 years of experience. I specialize in React, Next.js, and TypeScript, building modern and high-performance web applications.

portfolio.title: Portfolio — Pavel Tretyakov Projects | React, Next.js, TypeScript
portfolio.description: Portfolio of frontend developer Pavel Tretyakov. Here you can find my pet projects and real-world applications built with React, Next.js, and TypeScript, demonstrating my skills in developing modern web applications and user interfaces.

coverLetter.title: AI Cover Letter Generator — Pavel Tretyakov Project
coverLetter.description: An AI-powered service for automatically generating personalized cover letters based on job postings. A project by frontend developer Pavel Tretyakov demonstrating work with React, AI, and modern web technologies.

contacts.title: Contacts — Pavel Tretyakov Portfolio
contacts.description: Get in touch with Pavel Tretyakov via email, social networks, or an anonymous feedback form.

portfolio.title: Portfolio

coverLetter.descriptionCard: Add a job posting link and AI will increase your chances of getting hired
coverLetter.title: Cover Letter
coverLetter.subTitle: Increase your chances of getting a job with AI
coverLetter.descriptionParagraphFirst: The web service automatically creates a personalized cover letter based on a job vacancy link. The application analyzes the job description, identifies employer requirements, and generates a relevant response tailored to the candidate’s profile.
coverLetter.descriptionParagraphSecond: Helps speed up the job application process and improve the quality of communication with employers.
